#### Load libraries

```{r libreries, echo= FALSE}
library(limma)
library(edgeR)
library(DESeq2)
library(ggbiplot)
library (ggplot2)
```

# Load and select data Damaged 86 vs 170 ppb

#### Load data in matrix

```{r Load data in matrix, echo= FALSE}
# Load data. Count table 
alldata <-read.delim("../../data/allreadsgenes.txt")

# Convert dataframe to data matrix
x<-alldata
rownames(x)<-alldata[,1] # Add rownames
x<-x[ ,2:ncol(x)] # Remove double col with names
alldata<-as.matrix(x)
rm(x) # Remove x
```

#### Select subset data Damaged vs Tolerant 170 ppb

```{r Select subset data, echo= FALSE}
DSvsDC<- subset(alldata, select = c(DS_1, DS_2, DS_4,
                                    DC_1, DC_4, DC_5
                                    ))
```

#### Add characteristics
```{r characteristics, echo= FALSE}
tratamiento <- c("DS","DS","DS",
                 "DC","DC","DC")
label <- c("DS_1", "DS_2", "DS_4",
           "DC_1", "DC_4", "DC_5")
samples <-c("DS1", "DS2", "DS4",
            "DC1", "DC4", "DC5")
targets <- data.frame(tratamiento,label,samples)
rownames(targets) <- label
targets
```

#### Filtering genes

```{r Filtering genes, echo= FALSE}
table(rowSums(DSvsDC)==0) #Count O in T & D with FALSE and TRUE
suma <- rowSums(DSvsDC) # Sum reads per each gen 
filtconteos <- DSvsDC[suma != 0,] #Make matrix without zero reads per gen
dim(filtconteos)
head(filtconteos)
```
# Analyzes DGE with edgeR and DESeq2

#### edgeR

```{r edgeR, echo= FALSE}
## Clase DGEList
#Make list with counts and samples to NORMALIZATION
d <- DGEList(counts = filtconteos[,1:6], group = targets$tratamiento) ## Normalization
colnames(d) <- targets$label

## Normalization
d <- calcNormFactors(d)
plotMDS(d, main="plotMDS DSvsDC")

## Dispersors stimation
d <- estimateCommonDisp(d,verbose=TRUE)
d <- estimateTagwiseDisp(d)
plotBCV(d, main="plotBCV DSvsDC")

## Test
et <- exactTest(d,pair=c("DC","DS"))
top<- topTags(et, n= Inf)
hist(top$table$FDR, breaks = 100, main = "Hist FDR DSvsDC")
abline(v=0.05, col="red",lwd=3)
```

#### DESeq2

```{r DESeq2, echo= FALSE}
### Class DESeqDataSet
dds <- DESeqDataSetFromMatrix(countData=filtconteos, colData= targets, design=~tratamiento)

### Test
dds <- DESeq(dds)
head(dds)
res <- results(dds)
head (res)
```

# VolcanoPlots 

#### Plot Log fold change

```{r Plot Log fold change, echo= FALSE}
# edgeR
########p.value=0.1
de <- decideTestsDGE(et, adjust.method = "fdr" )
head(de)
detags <- rownames(d)[as.logical(de)]
plotSmear(et, de.tags=detags, main="plotSmear de edgeR") > abline(h=0, col="red", lwd=3)

# DESeq2
plotMA(res, main="MA-plot DESeq2", ylim=c(-5,5))
```

# FDR < 0.05

#### Sort the genes according to the attached p-value they have obtained FDR < 0.05

```{r Sort FDR0.05, echo= FALSE}
# edgeR
topSig <- top[top$table$FDR < 0.05, ]
dim(topSig)
#head(topSig)
genesDEedgeR <- rownames(topSig)
head(genesDEedgeR)
topSig_export<-topSig
topSig_export$ID<-genesDEedgeR
#head(topSig_export)
write.table(topSig_export, "../../data/DGE/EdgeR_DSvsDC_FDR_0.05.txt", sep="\t", row.names=T)

# DESeq2
# Sort by p-valores
resOrdered <- res[order(res$padj),]
# Only DEG
xx <-res[order(res$padj,na.last=NA),] 
head(xx)
resSig2 <- xx[xx$padj < 0.05, ]
dim(resSig2)
head(resSig2)
genesDEDESeq2 <- rownames(resSig2)
genesDEDESeq2
head(resSig2)
resSig2_export<-resSig2
resSig2_export$ID<-resSig2_export
head(resSig2_export)
write.table(resSig2_export, "../../data/DGE/DESeq2_DSvsDC_FDR_0.05.txt", sep="\t", row.names=T)

```
